text:
[Verse]
I saw you there by the coffee shop
Couldn’t say a word my heart did stop
Is this a dream or is it real
How do I show how I feel

[Verse 2]
You smiled and made my world so bright
In your eyes I saw the light
I’m tripping over every word
My mind flies free just like a bird

[Chorus]
Falling for you my heart does race
In your arms I find my place
Can’t deny this electric spark
Dancing close out in the dark

[Verse 3]
Every time we meet my knees go weak
You’re the only one I seek
Just one touch it’s all I crave
In your love I feel so brave

[Verse 4]
We could fly away take a chance
Lost in love a sweet romance
Hand in hand we touch the sky
You and me it’s you and I

[Chorus]
Falling for you my heart does race
In your arms I find my place
Can’t deny this electric spark
Dancing close out in the dark
title: Falling for You
